document.title: Tennessee Academic Standards for Fine Arts

2E5C7DD79AE8468CB12DE6394986AF79.description:
Analyze how responses to art are influenced by understanding
the time and place in which it was created, the available resources, and
cultural uses.

E930E8DD8A964E9E96D9C85B572CC3C5.description:
Individually or collaboratively create visual documentation of
places and times in which people gather to make and experience art or
design.

30A722D95C654139B719CD855D4A6179.description:
Compare and contrast evaluation of art based on personal
preference versus established criteria.

DB9CE423F31D4C119CA0D42384324B54.description:
Interpret art to identify ideas and mood conveyed by analyzing
art-making approaches, relevant context, subject matter, and use of media
while using appropriate art vocabulary.

B4885526F96A497F81067942CFD92557.description:
Explain how presentation methods and environments influence
how art is perceived and valued.

EEB6BAC773F94117A9553ABF8130888A.description:
Analyze multiple ways that images influence specific
audiences.

4EEADA28730B4C5385878BB1ABDF1BC3.description:
Compare and contrast perceptions of exhibitions in traditional
and emerging presentation spaces.

1B21FCC389444AB187A2959DB3E466D6.description:
Based on criteria, analyze and evaluate methods for preparing
and presenting art.

847A17F40DE646CFB2F3F8EE452A6194.description:
Compare and contrast how traditional and emerging
technologies have changed the way artwork is preserved, presented, and
experienced.

7A0BC80812F540AAB9B0537DD32877CF.description:
Reflect on and explain important information about personal
artwork in an artist statement or another format.

C34895B232644A9686145BE3672E4D8F.description:
Apply visual organizational strategies to design and produce a
work of art, design, or media that clearly communicates information or
ideas.

29B0999E0A924097835E8CD9CF0D2478.description:
Demonstrate awareness of ethical responsibility when using
traditional and emergent media.

B611CBB8C6214113AFE35C32EA206E17.description:
Persist in developing skills with various materials, methods,
and approaches in creating works of art or design using course specific
craftsmanship.

A470143BEC7C4BB98AF9B59067CD5E3F.description:
Develop criteria to guide art-making or design to meet an
identified goal.

8C86751A515A417C8288CDD3CF6DFEBA.description:
Apply formal and informal methods to overcome creative
blocks.
